General.Name: Professional Computer Technology Ltd
General.Description: Professional Computer Technology Limited engages in the programming, processing, testing, and trading of computer electronic products and components in China. The company sells active and passive components, computer basic and application software, and B2B components. It offers its products under the PCT, NOR, and flash brands. Professional Computer Technology Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 75, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
